compliance.title: Compliance & Consent
compliance.description: Please review the consent document and provide your digital signature to complete the application.
compliance.documentContent:
PATIENT CONSENT AND AGREEMENT

This document outlines the terms and conditions for your dental treatment financing application. By signing below, you acknowledge that:

1. You have read and understood all terms and conditions
2. You authorize the necessary credit checks and verifications
3. You consent to receive communications regarding your application
4. All information provided is accurate and complete

Placeholder fields will be replaced with your actual information:
- Patient Name: {{patientName}}
- Date of Birth: {{dateOfBirth}}
- Application Date: {{applicationDate}}

By providing your digital signature below, you agree to all terms and conditions set forth in this document.
compliance.authorizeCreditReport: I authorize DentiPay to obtain a soft credit report
compliance.consentCommunications: I consent to electronic communications (Email, SMS, Phone)
compliance.understandNoCredit: I understand this does not impact my credit score
compliance.confirmAccurate: I confirm all information provided is true and accurate
compliance.finalConsent: I agree that typing my name above constitutes my legal electronic signature and I consent to be legally bound by this document. I acknowledge that this signature has the same legal effect as a handwritten signature.
compliance.auditNotice: By signing, an audit trail will be created including your IP address, timestamp, and device information for legal compliance and security purposes.
compliance.successMessage: Your application and digital signature have been submitted successfully. We'll review your information and be in touch within 1-2 business days.
compliance.emailConfirmation: You will receive a confirmation email shortly with your application details and next steps.

nextSteps.review: Our team will review your application within 1-2 business days
nextSteps.contact: We'll contact you via email or phone with financing options
nextSteps.choose: You'll be able to choose the plan that works best for you
nextSteps.schedule: Once approved, you can schedule your treatment with confidence
